sect2.title: Save to Channel
sect2.para: The Save to Channel command saves the selection as a channel. The channel can then be used as a channel selection mask. You can find more information about them in the Channel Dialog section.

You will find a simple example how to use this command in the introduction of . It shows how to convert a selection to an alpha channel so that you can apply an alpha to logo filter to this selection.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the image menubar through
Select Save to Channel .
You can also access it from the Selection Editor.
